dc_description_s: This data layer represents recreational trails and stream networks for Richland County, Wisconsin in 2018. It is a feature class within the geodatabase 'Richland_Trails_HydroLine_2018.gdb'. [Obtained ATV information from Kevin Jasper of the Dayton Ridge Runners ATV/Snowmobile Club and from Dustin Wanless in 2018. He went to many meetings with the townships, county and city boards. Trout stream information came from the DNR. Bike information came from various biker groups and common knowledge. Snowmobile trails data came from the local snowmobile group and were confirmed in 2018.]
dct_alternativeTitle_sm: Trails and Hydrography Richland County\, WI 2018
dc_title_s: Trails and Hydrography Richland County, Wisconsin, 2018
